a.n: UBUNTU SOUTH AFRICA: LE GRAND PARDON

p.k: In May 1994, Nelson Mandela made the promise that in South Africa a new society should rise up that would make the world proud The film is a on whether this promise came true, through the lives of a group of South Africans who struggled to achieve the ideal of a country in peace despite the past and resentment provoked by Apartheid.
